title: 74: A Forensic Psychologist Discusses the Minds of  Killers
description:
Dr. Shari Schwartz, a forensic psychologist, talks about her experience talking with murderers and alleged murderers.
Are there any similarities with Alex Murdaugh's alleged behavior?
What does a forensic pathologist do?
Shari explains what red flags may appear before a person commits terrible crimes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
